string.name: text
string.value: Tip: When the pet reaches level 15, you can make it say certain things. \n #bExample) /Pet [something to say]#k

string.name: text
string.value: #eNoblesse Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value:
Table of Contents
#L1##b1. What is a Noblesse?#k#l
#L3##b2. Basic Controls#k#l
#L9##b3. What is an Item?#k#l
#L11##b4. AP and SP#k#l
#L14##b5. What is Job Advancement?#k#l
#L15##b6. 1st Job Advancement#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 1. What is a Noblesse?

string.name: text
string.value: While a Noblesse may start out weak, their potential is great. They start with limited skills, but by training in the Forest of Beginning, they'll eventually be powerful enough to join the ranks of the honorable knighthood.

string.name: text
string.value: When training in the Forest of Beginning has been completed, Noblesses will move to Ereve to experience the larger world. They will also obtain more skills by

string.name: text
string.value: making a Job Advancement. Even the strongest Knights began their careers as Noblesses. Work hard so you can be like them!

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 2-1. Basic Controls

string.name: text
string.value:
#eLeft, Right Arrow#n : Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrow#n : Use rope or ladder to climb up and down, use portal
#eAlt #n: Jump
#eCtrl #n: Attack
#eZ or 0 in NumPad #n: Pick up items
#eE #n: Open Equipment window
#eI #n: Open Item window
#eS #n: Open Ability window
#eK #n: Open Skill window

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k At the bottom right corner of the screen, assign one of the Hotkeys with a 'Use' item or a skill for easy access to the item or the skill.

string.name: text
string.value: 2-2. Commands

string.name: text
string.value: Enter the commands below in the chat window to use the corresponding functions.

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eChat#n\n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/all#n : Talk in regular chat mode.
#e/buddy#n : Talk in buddy chat mode.
#e/party#n : Talk to party members.
#e/guild#n : Talk to guild members.
#e/whisper [charcater name]#n : Talk to a particular person.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eAction#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/find [character name]#n : Check the login status of the character and the character's current location.\n#e/trade [character name]#n : Request a trade.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eParty#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinfo#n : Display information about current party members.\n#e/makeparty#n : Create a new party.\n#e/leaveparty#n : Leave the current party.

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinvite#n : Invite a new party member.#b(Party Leader)#k\n#e/partyexpell#n : Kick a party member out of the party.#b(Party Leader)#k

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 3. What are Items?

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eEquipment Items#n\n These items can be equipped on characters to boost abilities. You can also equip your purchased cash items, which customize the look of a character.

string.name: text
string.value: To equip an item, open the Equipment window and drag the item to the corresponding equipment inventory slot, or simply double-click on the item you want to equip.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eUse Items#n\n These items consist of potions that recover HP / MP, scrolls that upgrade equipment, and other consumable items. Double-click on an item to use it. The effects of the item will be applied and then the item will dissappear.

string.name: text
string.value: (3)#e Etc. Items#n\n These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, jewels, and other miscellaneous items.

string.name: text
string.value: These items don't do much by themselves but can be used to complete quests and/or interact with NPCs.

string.name: text
string.value: (4)#e Cash Items#n\n Items that can be purchased in the Cash Shop, primarily to customize the look of a character and create other visual effects. #rCash items can be purchased by charging your account with cash. #k

string.name: text
string.value: \n#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 4. AP and SP

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eAP(Ability Point)#n\nPoints that can be assigned to one of these categories: Strength(STR), Dexterity(DEX), Intelligence(INT), Luck(LUK), MaxHP, MaxMP. Earn 6 points each time you level up. #e#bAuto-Assign#k#n Press this to have the game automaticaly assign AP for you.

string.name: text
string.value: #bStrength(STR)#k - Essential for equipping heavy weapons or armor. The most important stat for determining the attack strength of Dawn Warriors and Thunder Breakers.

string.name: text
string.value: #bDexterity(DEX)#k - The higher this stat, the higher your accuracy and avoidability. The most important stat for determining the attack strength of Wind Archers.

string.name: text
string.value: #bIntelligence(INT)#k - The higher this stat, the higher the success ratio of magic attacks. It also increases Max MP and the amount of MP gained at each level up. The most important stat for determining the magic attack strength of Blaze Wizards.

string.name: text
string.value: #bLuck(LUK)#k - The higher this stat, the higher your avoidability. It also decreases the amount of EXP lost when a character dies. The most important stat for determining the attack strength of Night Walkers.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eSP(Skill Point)#n\nPoints that can be assigned to skills after the 1st Job Advancement. 1 point is given with the 1st Job Advancement and 3 points are given each time you level up after that.

string.name: text
string.value: 5. What is a Job Advancement?

string.name: text
string.value: A Job Advancement can be performed once you reach a certain level. Job Advancements are made as follows: #r1st advancement at Level 10, 2nd advancement at Level 30, 3rd advancement at Level 70#k

string.name: text
string.value: Job Advancements allow you to learn new skills and equip new weapons corresponding to your job.

string.name: text
string.value: It also increases HP / MP, attack / defense, and the number of inventory slots you have.

string.name: text
string.value: 6. 1st Job Advancement

string.name: text
string.value: In order to make your 1st Job Advancement, you must leave the Forest of Beginning and head to Ereve.

string.name: text
string.value: Simply leave the Forest of Beginning to enter Ereve.

string.name: text
string.value: Next, move to the NPC that will give you your Job Advancement.

string.name: text
string.value: (1)#eDawn Warrior#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bMihile#k in Ereve to learn about the Dawn Warrior.

string.name: text
string.value: (2)#eBlaze Wizard#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bOz#k in Ereve to learn about the Blaze Wizard.

string.name: text
string.value: (3)#eWind Archer#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bIrena#k in Ereve to learn more about the

string.name: text
string.value: Wind Archer.\n

string.name: text
string.value: (4)#eNight Walker#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bEckhart#k in Ereve to learn more about the Night Walker.

string.name: text
string.value: (5)#eThunder Breaker#n\n#rLevel 10 and Above#k Once the criteria is met, meet #bHawkeye#k in Ereve to learn more about the Thunder Breaker.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k At the time of your 1st Job Advancement, #byour AP will be redistributed depending on what job you picked.#k After that, it would be smart to put your AP into the stats that enhance your new job.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k If you wait until Lv. 30 to make your Job Advancement, you will not receive the SP corresponding to previous levels. Therefore, we recommend that you make your 1st Job Advancement as soon as you reach the eligible level.

string.name: text
string.value: \n\n#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: #eLegend's Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value:
Table of Contents
#L1##b1. What's a Legend?#k#l
#L3##b2. Simple Controls#k#l
#L9##b3. What are Items?#k#l
#L11##b4. AP and SP#k#l
#L14##b5. What's a Job Advancement?#k#l
#L15##b6. Guide to 1st Job Advancement#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 1. What's a Legend?

string.name: text
string.value: The Legend is a historic figure known to have sealed up the Black Wizard in the past. Unfortunately, due to the curse of the Black Wizard, the Legend ended up losing all his skills and memories, and was sealed up inside a block of ice for centuries until one day when Lilin came to his rescue.

string.name: text
string.value: After waking up at Rien and experiencing the new world firsthand, you will complete the training both at the Cold Forest and the training center to make the first job advancement. Then, you'll slowly remember the abilities and skills that once made you a Legend.

string.name: text
string.value: The resurrection of the Black Wizard cannot be prevented unless you recover all of your previous powers that once made you a Legend. Continue training so that one day you'll be back above the rest!

string.name: text
string.value: \n\n#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 2-1. Simple Controls

string.name: text
string.value:
#eLeft/Right Arrows#n : Move left and right
#eUp/Down Arrows#n : Climbing the rope/ladder, use portal
#eAlt#n: Jump
#eCtrl#n: Attack
#eZ or 0 from numpad #n: Pick up item
#eE#n: Open equipment inventory
#e#n: Open item inventory
#eS#n: Open stat window
#eK#n: Open skill window

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k Register your skill or consumable items on the bottom right hand corner of your screen as HotKeys for easy access.

string.name: text
string.value: 2-2. Commands

string.name: text
string.value: Enter the following commands on the chat window to access the following functions.

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eChat#n\n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/all#n : Displays chat to everyone.
#e/buddy#n : Only displays chat to your buddies.
#e/party#n : Only displays chat to your party members.
#e/guild#n : Only displays chat to your guild members.

string.name: text
string.value: #e/whisper [character name]#n : Sends out a whisper.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eAct#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/find [character name]#n : Displays character's on/offline status along with the user’s current location.\n#e/trade [character name]#n : Sends a request for an item exchange/trade.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eParty#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinfo#n : Displays info on all currently enrolled party members.\n#e/makeparty#n : Creates a new party.\n#e/quitparty#n : Quits from the currently enrolled party.

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinvite#n : Sends a party invitation.#b(Party Leaders Only)#k\n#e/partyexpel#n : Expels a member from the party.#b(Party Leaders Only)#k

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 3. What are Items?

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eEquipment Item#n\n An item you can equip on your body. There are two types of equipment items: regular ones that boost your stats, and cash items that are mainly for decorative/accessory purposes.

string.name: text
string.value: In order to equip an equipment item, you must open the equipment window and drag the item onto the corresponding slot, or double-click the item.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #e’Use’ Item#n\n These are consumable items that consist of potions that improve HP/MP, or scrolls that boost the stats of the equipment item. They can be used by simply double-clicking the item. (Since they are disposable items, they’ll disappear after use.)

string.name: text
string.value: (3)#e Etc. Item#n\n These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, gems, and others. Etc. items cannot be used directly,

string.name: text
string.value: but can be used to benefit your game through quests and NPCs.

string.name: text
string.value: (4)#e Cash Items#n\n These are decorative items, sometimes with special effects, that can be purchased through the Cash Shop. #rCash Items can only be purchased with NX Prepaid, which can be charged to your account.#k

string.name: text
string.value: \n#L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 4. AP and SP

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eAP(Ability Point)#n\nPoints that can be assigned to any of the following categories: Strength (STR), Dexterity (DEX), Intelligence (INT), Luck (LUK), MaxHP, and MaxMP. You’ll receive 5 AP each time you level up. You can press #e#bauto-distribute#k#n to automatically assign the distribution of your AP.

string.name: text
string.value: #bStrength (STR)#k ? A necessary stat for equipping heavy armor and weapons. It’s the most important stat that determines the strength of an Aran's attack.

string.name: text
string.value: #bDexterity (DEX)#k ? The higher this stat, the higher your Accuracy and Avoidability.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eSP(Skill Point)#n\nPoints which can be used on skills acquired through job advancements. Starting out as a Legend, no SP will be assigned to you, but make the 1st job advancement and you will receive 1 point. After, each level-up will reward you with 3 Skill Points.

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 5. What's a Job Advancement?

string.name: text
string.value: When you reach a certain level, you will be able to make a job advancement. #rThe 1st job advancement takes place upon reaching Level 10, the 2nd at Level 30, the 3rd at Level 70, and the 4th at Level 120#k.

string.name: text
string.value: Once you make a job advancement, you will not only receive a group of new skills, but also be able to equip weapons that are specifically made for your job.

string.name: text
string.value: Your HP and MP will also receive a uniform boost, as will your attack and defense abilities. You will also be awarded with additional slots in your Inventory.

string.name: text
string.value: 6. Guide to 1st Job Advancement

string.name: text
string.value: To make the 1st job advancement, you must first leave the Ice Cave and head over to Rien.

string.name: text
string.value: To get to Rien, escape the Cold Forest and head to the right from the Field West of Rien.

string.name: text
string.value: There, you must complete the quests given by Lilin in order to achieve the 1st job advancement.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k Once you achieve the 1st job advancement, #byour AP will be redistributed to fit your job#k. Thereafter, it is recommended that you focus on the stats that pertain to your job class when distributing your AP.

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k If you make the first job advancement AFTER reaching Level 30, you will not receive the SP that is available to levels below 30. Thus, it’s highly recommended that you make the job advancement as soon as you are eligible.

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: #bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 2#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bHistory of Santa's Family#k

string.name: text
string.value: Just like there aren't not much facts revealed about Santa Claus, so as for the family of Santa. However, according to Director of Sales S.Y Johnson from Maple Herald, one of the Top class media in Maple World, there is a staff who can reach Santa Claus and Santa Claus makes his expresses his official stand once a year through this staff.

string.name: text
string.value: S.Y Johnson says he cannot tell the staff's name but emphasized that the staff is quite reliable.

string.name: text
string.value: Known from Maple Herald so far, when Santa Claus was making his trip to Finland, he saw a beautiful woman working alone at the Christmas dawn in a Socks factory. She lived in a poor neighborhood and her neighborhood was so poor that children did not even have their own pair of socks to be hung on the Christmas eve.

string.name: text
string.value: So, the lady was making the socks for the children all night long. Santa Claus obviously fell in love with her and proposed to her right away which led them to a happy marriage. Santa Claus whose address remains still unknown started to live with Mrs. Santa in #bHappy Ville#k right next to the town where she was from. Mrs. Claus helped her husband by keep making socks in the factory for all the Maplers in Maple World even today.

string.name: text
string.value: #bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 3#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bMaking Christmas Socks#k

string.name: text
string.value: Christmas Socks in Maple World is a must have for the Maplers to get the presents from Santa Claus during the Christmas season. Hang the socks where Santa Claus passes by, and Santa Claus will put in presents in the socks pending on the good deeds you did through our the year.

string.name: text
string.value: To have the present from Santa Claus, you will need a standard sized and quality socks. If presents were put in to the wrong sized or disqualified socks, it will be ripped off or the present will be damaged.

string.name: text
string.value: This standard has been made by Mrs. Claus who has been running the socks factory in Happy Ville for over 60 years. If the standard is met, the socks can hold any shape and any weight of present. Mrs. Santa finally reveals it secret in the following.

string.name: text
string.value: 1. Socks Frame : Socks frame is the basic mold to make the right-sized socks. However, artisan who is making this frame has retired so it is no longer produced. It's been told that there are lots of genuine socks frame in Mrs. Claus's socks factory and she is willing to rent it upon requests.

string.name: text
string.value: 2. Qualified Knitting ball : It is the basic material for the Socks. Only the qualified knitting ball can provide the flexibility and the thermostat which can hold the present from Santa safely.. This qualified knitting ball can be obtained from #bNooNoo the Snowman#k or the monsters around the town.

string.name: text
string.value: #bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 4#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bSanta Claus, who is he?#k

string.name: text
string.value: There is only one who has made an acquaintance with Santa Claus besides the Happy Ville town people. According to S.Y Johnson, the director of sales in Maple Herald, the one is an employee working as a part timer at the Maple Herald.

string.name: text
string.value: Through annual reports about Santa Claus in Maple Herald, we can take a glance at a humane aspect of Santa Claus. Santa Claus is fundamentally optimistic. Most of his face is covered with his beard that it is only his eyes we can actually see. However, since he is always smiling, it is only Mrs. Claus who has clearly seen the eyes of Santa Claus.

string.name: text
string.value: During off-Christmas season, Santa Claus usually writes back the letters from children all over the world and also takes a good care of reindeers as well as the sledge.

string.name: text
string.value: During this season, Santa Claus also estimates the amount and the types of presents that he should be preparing for the next Christmas season according to the letters and makes pre-order to the present company. And then he arranges the stocks from last year and pays the present company.

string.name: text
string.value: In fact, this off Christmas season is even busier than Christmas season as preparation is getting harder and harder every year he gets old. Santa Claus is always smiling and happy to eyes of Children as he is bringing dreams and hopes to the world but according to Mrs. Claus, there certainly is suffering and loneliness that Santa Claus should endure. Whenever he is feeling blue, he wouldn't tell his wife but #bhe would go to a big tree in Happy Ville#k and take a rest for few hours.

string.name: text
string.value: Recently, more and more children are not starting to believe in Santa Claus anymore and lesser and lesser letter are addressed to Santa Claus every year from Maple World. Mrs. Claus says that this is making him lose his motivation. However, if many Maplers believe in Santa Clause and have confidence that he is coming to town, Santa Claus will find his will again and bring a Happy Christmas in Maple World.

string.name: text
string.value: #bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 5#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bHow to conduct the good deeds#k

string.name: text
string.value: To have the present from Santa Claus, first, you will need to make the standard socks, second, hang the socks where Santa Claus often passes by. Once the socks are hung, do as many good deeds you can to receive a better present from Santa Claus.

string.name: text
string.value: Following are the examples of \ngood deeds

string.name: text
string.value:
- Help your parents
- Study hard
- Not to fight with your friends
- Follow the traffic order
- Not to use vulgar words
- Not to tell a lie
- Not to be greedy and help the others

string.name: text
string.value: Not only limited to above, there are so many things that you can do in Maple World. You can conduct good deeds and get the fame in return. The more fame as you have increased, the better present you will get from Santa Claus. You can also have your fame increased by Christmas quests.

string.name: text
string.value: #bEncyclopedia Volume 6#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bAppendix : Santa Claus town in Finland#k

string.name: text
string.value: According to Maple Herald, Santa Claus lives in a town called Rovaniemi in Finland. In here, Santa Claus prepares for the next Christmas and maintains the sledge as well as takes care of reindeers too.

string.name: text
string.value: Santa Claus and a lot of people who are helping Santa Claus live in this town. As it gets close to Christmas, millions of letters start to arrive to Santa Claus from all over the world and he writes back every single letters back.

string.name: text
string.value: If there are children who want anything from Santa Claus can always write to him to the address below and Santa Claus will write the children back wherever the letter is from.

string.name: text
string.value: So, if there are a Maplers out there wishing something from Santa Claus, we recommend you to write a letter to the following address.\n\n#bSanta Claus' Main Post Office, 96930 Napapiiri, Finland#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bSanta Encyclopedia Volume 1#k

string.name: text
string.value: #bCommon Sense of Santa Claus#k

string.name: text
string.value: \nNo certain information has been revealed until now about Santa Claus. It is just broadly known that Santa Claus who is making his tour around the world with his sledge and reindeers (including Rudolph) will put in gifts in the socks hung by chimney by the kind children.

string.name: text
string.value: As it can be conjectured by a document found somewhere in Germany which looked like a Dairy of Santa Claus, it seems like even Santa Claus does not know when and why he started to giving our presents to children.

string.name: text
string.value: However, one thing can be derived from this diary and that is Santa Claus keeps dreaming about repeated dream. Experts carefully predict that this could be a key to secrets of Santa Claus.

string.name: text
string.value: Following is a page from his dairy about the dream.

string.name: text
string.value: Year XXXX / Date unknown

string.name: text
string.value: I had the same dream again today. Like always, it was #b6th of December#k and it looked like somewhere in Turkey. I was hunting in the sky with my flying horse. I hunted with my friends and I think they are some kinds of GOD. I felt as if they are my subordinates because they kept calling me #bOdin#k and me being a GOD leading them.

string.name: text
string.value: Tired from hunting for a long time, we decided to take a rest on the roof of a house. It was weird to see that there were #bboots#k hung by the chimney which were coming out from the roof tops. More surprisingly, there were full of Carrot, Grass and sugar inside the boots as if they knew that we will be taking a rest there. We really appreciated their kind effort and spirit so we have filled the boots with candies and gifts and left for the hunting again.

string.name: text
string.value: One strange thing is that my followers call me Odin but when I go across the lands and reach Germany, they call me #bSaint Nicolas#k. In Netherlands, they also call me #bSinterKlass#k. It's funny that all of these names sound like my original name, Santa Claus.

string.name: text
string.value: BTW, my dream always ends with Director of Sales, Johnson appearing and...(Ellipsis)

string.name: text
string.value: 펫에 대한 알림문

string.name: text
string.value: \n90여일간 당신의 곁에서 사랑스러운 펫으로 지낼 것입니다.

string.name: text
string.value: 90일이 지나 생명수가 다 마르면 당신은 #b생명수#k를 구해 #b마르의 숲#k에 있는 요정을 만나거나 루디브리엄의 #b에오스탑 입구#k에 있는 위습을 만나 펫을 부활시킬 수도 있습니다.

string.name: text
string.value: 조련사나 펫 먹이 상인을 찾아가 펫의 먹이를 먹이고 명령어를 사용하여 펫과의 친밀도를 높여보세요.

string.name: text
string.value: 펫 명령어 안내서 : 황금돼지 편\n

string.name: text
string.value:
펫 레벨 : 1 ~ 30
앉아
때찌,안돼,혼난다,혼날래
응가
사랑해,좋아해,내사랑

string.name: text
string.value: 펫 레벨 : 10 ~ 30\n말해봐,말해,말해줘

string.name: text
string.value: 펫 레벨 : 20 ~ 30\n자자,졸립지,쿨쿨,잘자\n개인기

string.name: text
string.value: Tip. 펫의 레벨이 15가 되면 특정 말을 하도록 시킬 수 있습니다. \n #b예) /펫 [할 말]#k

string.name: text
string.value: Notice about the pets

string.name: text
string.value: \nThe pet will remain with you for 90 days.

string.name: text
string.value: When 90 days have passed and all of the Life Water has dried up, you can revive your pet by obtaining "Life Water" and talking to the fairy in #bMarr's Forest#k or to the Wisp at the #bEos Tower Entrance#k in Ludibrium.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Command Guide : Baby Tiger\n

string.name: text
string.value:
Pet Level : 1 - 30
 Hungry?, Food?
Don't,No,Scold,Stop it!
Poo,Poop,Focus
Sleep,Sleepy,Doze,Tired
Go away,Stupid,Grawl,Angry
What's this?Curious?/Say it!,Tell,Tell me

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level : 15 - 30\nGood, Impressive, Proud\nLove you,Like you,Honey

string.name: text
string.value: Tip. When the pet reaches level 15, you can make it talk. \n #bEx.) /pet [What you want the pet to say]#k

string.name: text
string.value: About the pet description

string.name: text
string.value: \nDuring this 90 days, I will become the most loyal and reliable partner by your side!

string.name: text
string.value: \nWhen the pet dried up after 90 days, you may purchase the #bWater of Life#k from the Cash Shop and revive the dead pet by talking to #bMar the Fairy#k located inside #bEllinia#k. You may also revive the dead pet from #bWisp#k, located at the #bEntrance of EOS Tower.#k

string.name: text
string.value: You can purchase Pet Food from the Pet Food Merchant to feed your pet. You can also use various commands to increase the closeness of you and your pet.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Command Guide: Pig

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 1 - 30\nsit, no, bad, badgirl, badboy, stupid, ihateyou, dummy, iloveyou, poop

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 10 - 30\ntalk, chat, say, smile

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 20 - 30\nthelook

string.name: text
string.value: If pet's level reaches 15, you may order pet to say certain lines \n #bexample) /pet insert your own#k

string.name: text
string.value: Notice about the Pets

string.name: text
string.value: Training your pet by using commands or feeding your pet will increase your pet's Closeness and level. Basic pet food is sold by pet food merchants, and special pet food is sold in the Cash Shop.

string.name: text
string.value: If your pet expires and turns into a doll, you can purchase #bWater of Life#k from the Cash Shop to revive it.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Command Guide: White Monkey

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 1 - 30\nsit, rest, no, bad, badgirl, badboy, iloveyou, stand, up, pee

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 11 - 30\ntalk, chat, say

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 20 - 30\nplay, sleep, sleepy, gotobed

string.name: text
string.value: If pet's level reaches 15, you may order pet to say certain lines by using #b/pet#k command.

string.name: text
string.value: Visit the Pet Trainer or Pet Food Merchant to buy food for your pet. Then use pet commands to increase intimacy with your pet.

string.name: text
string.value: Notice about the Pets

string.name: text
string.value: Training your pet by using commands or feeding your pet will increase your pet's Closeness and level. Basic pet food is sold by pet food merchants, and special pet food is sold in the Cash Shop.

string.name: text
string.value: If your pet expires and turns into a doll, you can purchase #bWater of Life#k from the Cash Shop to revive it.

string.name: text
string.value: Training your pet by using commands or developing closeness by feeding your pet will increase your pet's level.

string.name: text
string.value: Your Pet

string.name: text
string.value: \nDuring this 30 days, I will become the most loyal and reliable partner by your side!

string.name: text
string.value: \nWhen the pet dried up after 90 days, you may purchase the #bWater of Life#k from the Cash Shop and revive the dead pet by talking to #bMar the Fairy#k located inside #bEllinia#k. You may also revive the dead pet from #bWisp#k, located at the #bEntrance of EOS Tower.#k

string.name: text
string.value: When equipped with a # t1802204 # or # t1802200 # with pets, you tell me the power of friendship primarily the # k # b depending on the level.

string.name: text
string.value: Notice about the Pets

string.name: text
string.value: It'll serve as a lovely pet to you for the next 90 days.

string.name: text
string.value: You can instantly revive an expired pet with the #rPremium Water of Life#k from the #bCash Shop#k.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Command Guide: Blackheart

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 1 - 30\nsit, slap, no, bad, don't, iloveyou

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 10 - 30\npoop, talk, chat, say, sleep, sleepy, zzz, goodnight

string.name: text
string.value: Tip: You can control what your pet says when it reaches Lv. 15.\n #bExample) /pet [What you want your pet to say]#k

string.value: \nA lovely pet will keep you company for the next 90 days.

string.name: text
string.value: It'll serve as a lovely pet to you for the next 30 days.

string.name: text
string.value: Once 30 days pass and the Life Water is used up, you can gather up the #bLife Water#k by meeting up with a fairy in #bMarr's Forest#k to revive your pet. Visit the pet training instructor or the store owner to increase your closeness level with your pet. You can also use commands to your pet to raise your closeness level.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Notice

string.name: text
string.value: \nA trusty pet that will keep you company for the next 90 days.

string.name: text
string.value: You can revive an expired pet with #bWater of Life#k from the #bCash Shop#k. Double-click on it, and select the pet you’d like to revive.

string.name: text
string.value: Feeding your pet will solidify the bond between you! The pet tamer and the pet food merchant both sell food that will increase Closeness.

string.name: text
string.value: Notice about the Pets

string.name: text
string.value: Training your pet by using commands or feeding your pet will increase your pet's Closeness and level. Basic pet food is sold by pet food merchants, and special pet food is sold in the Cash Shop.

string.name: text
string.value: If your pet expires and turns into a doll, you can purchase #bWater of Life#k from the Cash Shop to revive it.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Notice

string.name: text
string.value: \nA wonderful pet that will keep you company for the next 90 days.

string.name: text
string.value: You can instantly revive an expired pet with the #rPremium Water of Life#k from the #bCash Shop#k.

string.name: text
string.value: Feeding your pet will solidify the bond between you! The pet tamer and the pet food merchant both sell food that will increase Closeness.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Command Guide: Macaron Bear

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 1 - 30\nsit, slap, no, bad, don't, iloveyou

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 10 - 30\npoop, talk, chat, say, sleep, sleepy, zzz, goodnight

string.name: text
string.value: Tip: You can control what your pet says when it reaches Lv. 15.\n #bExample) /pet [What you want your pet to say]#k

string.name: text
string.value: Notice about the Pets

string.name: text
string.value: It'll serve as a lovely pet to you for the next 90 days.

string.name: text
string.value: When 90 days have passed and your pet has turned into a doll, you can purchase the #bWater of Life#k to reawaken your pet. Training your pet by using commands or developing closeness by feeding your pet will increase your pet's level.

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 10 - 30\ntalk, chat, say, play

string.name: text
string.value: Pet Level: 20 - 30\nsleep, sleepy, zzz

string.name: text
string.value: If pet's level reaches 15, you may order pet to say certain lines by using #b/pet#k command.

string.name: text
string.value: 펫에 대한 알림문

string.name: text
string.value: \n30여일간 당신의 곁에서 사랑스러운 펫으로 지낼 것입니다.

string.name: text
string.value: You can instantly revive an expired pet with the #rPremium Water of Life#k from the #bCash Shop#k.

string.name: text
string.value: 조련사나 펫 먹이 상인을 찾아가 펫의 먹이를 먹이고 명령어를 사용하여 펫과의 친밀도를 높여보세요.

string.name: text
string.value: 펫 명령어 안내서 : 무적의 디저트 편\n

string.name: text
string.value:
펫 레벨 : 1 ~ 30
앉아
때찌,안돼,혼난다,혼날래
자자, 졸립지, 쿨쿨, 잘자
사랑해,좋아해,내사랑

string.name: text
string.value: 펫 레벨 : 10 ~ 30\n말해봐,말해,말해줘

string.name: text
string.value: 펫 레벨 : 20 ~ 30\n춤출래, 춤춰\n변신

string.name: text
string.value: Tip. 펫의 레벨이 15가 되면 특정 말을 하도록 시킬 수 있습니다. \n #b예) /펫 [할 말]#k

string.name: text
string.value: 펫에 대한 알림문

string.name: text
string.value: \n90여일간 당신의 곁에서 사랑스러운 펫으로 지낼 것입니다.

string.name: text
string.value: 90일이 지나 생명수가 다 마르면 당신은 #b캐시샵#k에서 판매하는 #r프리미엄 생명의 물#k을 구해 인형상태의 펫을 바로 부활시킬 수 있습니다.

string.name: text
string.value: 조련사나 펫 먹이 상인을 찾아가 펫의 먹이를 먹이고 명령어를 사용하여 펫과의 친밀도를 높여보세요.

string.name: text
string.value: 펫 명령어 안내서 : 쁘띠 진 힐라와 아이들 펫\n

string.name: text
string.value:
펫 레벨 : 1 ~ 30
말해봐,말해,말해줘
때찌,안돼,혼난다,혼날래
사랑해
응가
자자,졸립지,쿨쿨,잘자

string.name: text
string.value: Tip. 펫의 레벨이 15가 되면 특정 말을 하도록 시킬 수 있습니다. \n #b예) /펫 [할 말]#k

string.name: text
string.value: #eEvan Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value: Table of Contents\n#L1##b1. Basic Controls#k#l\n#L7##b2. What is an item?#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 1-1. Basic Controls

string.name: text
string.value:
#eLeft, Right Arrows#n: Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrows#n: Climb a rope or ladder, use portal
#eAlt#n: Jump
#eCtrl#n: Attack
#eZ or 0 on NumPad#n: Pick up items
#eE#n: Open Equipment window
#eI#n: Open Item Inventory window
#eS#n: Open Character Stat window
#eK#n: Open Skill window

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k You can easily access Use items and Skills by assigning them to hotkeys located at the bottom right of the screen.

string.name: text
string.value: 1-2. Commands

string.name: text
string.value: Perform various functions by entering the commands provided below into the chat window.

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eChat#n\n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/all#n: Speak in the standard chat channel.
#e/buddy#n: Speak in the buddy chat channel.
#e/party#n: Speak to your party members.
#e/guild#n: Speak to your guild.
#e/whisper [character name]#n: Speak directly to a particular player.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eAction#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/trade [Character Name]#n: Request trade.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eParty#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinfo#n: Display information about current party members.\n#e/makeparty#n: Create a new party.\n#e/leaveparty#n: Leave the current party.

string.name: text
string.value: #e/partyinvite#n: Invite a new party member. #b(Party Leader Only)#k\n#e/partyexpel#n: Kick a party member out of the party. #b(Party Leader Only)#k

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 2. What is an item?

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eEquipment Items#n\n These items can be equipped on characters to boost abilities. You can also equip your purchased cash items, which customize the look of a character.

string.name: text
string.value: To equip an item, open the Equipment window and drag the item to the corresponding equipment inventory slot, or simply double-click on the item you want to equip.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eUse Items#n\n These items consist of potions that recover HP/MP, scrolls that upgrade equipment, and other consumable items. Double-click on an item to use it. The effects of the item will be applied and then the item will disappear.

string.name: text
string.value: (3)#e Etc Items#n\n These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, jewels, and other miscellaneous items.

string.name: text
string.value: These items don't do much by themselves but can be used to complete quests and/or interact with NPCs.

string.name: text
string.value: (4)#e Cash Items#n\n Items that can be purchased in the Cash Shop, primarily to customize the look of a character and create other visual effects. #rCash items can be purchased by charging your account with cash. #k

string.name: text
string.value: \n#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: #ePuzzle King Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHow to obtain Puzzle Piece A.#n#k

string.name: text
string.value: #rHunt the event monster!#k

string.name: text
string.value: During the 6th Anniversary event, the special monster, #b6th Anniversary Cake#k, appears in all maps and towns in the Maple World. Defeat the monster to obtain #bPuzzle Piece A#k.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHow to obtain Puzzle Piece B.#n#k

string.name: text
string.value: #rNPC Inkie sells it!#k

string.name: text
string.value: You can purchase Puzzle Piece B from the NPC Inkie, who appears in town during the 6th Anniversary event. Inkie and Inkwell sell other rare items besides the Puzzle Piece, too, so make sure to visit them!

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHow to obtain Puzzle Pieces C, D, and E.#n#k

string.name: text
string.value: #rDo the MapleStory 6th Anniversary Quest!#k

string.name: text
string.value: Do the repeatable #b'MapleStory 6th Anniversary' quest during the event to receive Puzzle Piece C, D, or E at random. You must complete the whole quest to obtain the Puzzle Piece!

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHow to obtain Puzzle Piece F.#n#k

string.name: text
string.value: #rPop the Balloon!#k

string.name: text
string.value: Participate in the #b'Balloon Hunt'#k party quest, available only during the 6th Anniversary event! Pop the Balloon to obtain the Puzzle Piece. Make sure to participate, as you can receive a variety of gifts when you win!

string.name: text
string.value: #e#bHow to obtain Puzzle Piece G.#n#k

string.name: text
string.value: #rGrow a Maple Tree!#k

string.name: text
string.value: During the 6th Anniversary period, grow the #bMaple Tree#k on Maple Tree Hill until it pops to obtain Puzzle Piece G.\nIf you give more than 50 Sunshines to the Maple Tree in one day, Aramia can also give you a Puzzle Piece G that day.

string.name: text
string.value: #eCitizen's Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value: Table of Contents\n#L1##b1. Basic Controls#k#l\n#L7##b2. What are Items?#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 1-1. Basic Controls

string.name: text
string.value:
#eLeft, Right Arrow#n: Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrow#n: Use rope or ladder to climb up and down, use portal
#eAlt #n: Jump
#eCtrl #n: Attack
#eZ or 0 in NumPad #n: Pick up items
#eE #n: Open Equipment window
#eI #n: Open Item window
#eS #n: Open Ability window
#eK #n: Open Skill window

string.name: text
string.value: #bTip.#k At the bottom right corner of the screen, assign one of the Hotkeys with a 'Use' item or a skill for easy access to the item or the skill.

string.name: text
string.value: 1-2. Commands

string.name: text
string.value: Enter the commands below in the chat window to use the corresponding functions.

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eChat#n\n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/all#n: Speak in the standard chat channel.
#e/buddy#n: Speak in the buddy chat channel.
#e/party#n: Speak to your party members.
#e/guild#n: Speak to your guild.
#e/whisper [character name]#n: Speak directly to a particular player.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eAction#n\n

string.name: text
string.value: #e/trade [Character Name]#n: Request trade.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eParty#n

string.name: text
string.value:
#e/partyinfo#n: Display information about current party members.
#e/makeparty#n: Create a new party.
#e/leaveparty#n: Leave the party
#e/partyinvite [character name]#n: Invite a new party member. #b(Party Leader Only)#k
#e/partyexpel [character name]#n: Kick a party member out of the party. #b(Party Leader Only)#k

string.name: text
string.value: #L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: 2. What are Items?

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eEquipment Item#n\n These items can be equipped on characters to boost abilities. You can also equip your purchased cash items, which customize the look of a character.

string.name: text
string.value: To equip an item, open the Equipment window and drag the item to the corresponding equipment inventory slot, or simply double-click on the item you want to equip.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eUse Items#n\n These items consist of potions that recover HP/MP, Scrolls that upgrade equipment, and other consumable items. Double-click on an item to use it. The effects of the item will be applied, and then the item will disappear.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eEtc. Items#n\n These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, jewels, and other miscellaneous items.

string.name: text
string.value: These items don't do much by themselves, but can be used to complete quests and/or interact with NPCs.

string.name: text
string.value: (4) #eCash Items#n\n Items that can be purchased in the Cash Shop, primarily to customize the look of a character and create other visual effects. #rCash items can be purchased by charging your account with cash.#k

string.name: text
string.value: \n#L1##bReturn to the Table of Contents#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: #bMapleSEA 6th Year Anniversary#k

string.name: text
string.value: \nIn celebration fo MapleSEA's 6th Birstday, the great magician Greandal has prepared a gift for the sincere Mapler.

string.name: text
string.value: Please go find Grendal the really old to have attendance book stamped in order to prove your sincerity.

string.name: text
string.value: #bGrendal's Message#k

string.name: text
string.value: #nIt's been 6 years since the Maple World has started for the first time...

string.name: text
string.value: We deeply thank you for your love and support for MapleStory past 6 years.

string.name: text
string.value: Therefore, we have prepared something for the sincere Maplers. Please come find me.

string.name: text
string.value: June, 1st, 2011

#eLeft, Right Arrow#n: Move left and right
#eUp, Down Arrow#n: Use ropes or ladders to climb up and down, use portals

string.value: 1-2. Commands

string.name: text
string.value: Enter the commands below in the chat window to use the corresponding functions.

#e/buddy#n: Speak in the buddy chat channel.

string.name: text
string.value: 2. What are Items?

string.name: text
string.value: (1) #eEquipment Items#n\n These items can be equipped on characters to boost abilities. You can also equip your purchased cash items, which customize the look of your character.

string.name: text
string.value: To equip an item, open the Equipment window and drag the item to the corresponding equipment inventory slot, or simply double-click on the item you want to equip.

string.name: text
string.value: (2) #eUse Items#n\n These items consist of potions that recover HP/MP, Scrolls that upgrade equipment, and other consumable items. Double-click on an item to use it. The effects of the item will be applied, and then the item will disappear.

string.name: text
string.value: (3) #eEtc. Items#n\n These include items dropped by monsters, quest items, ores, jewels, and other miscellaneous items.

string.name: text

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\nI had a meeting with the king of Ludibrium... he really puts my patience to the test. I heard he's quite old, but why does he act like a kid?

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\n(Hard to read as this part has been damaged.)

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\nI got scolded by Elena for speaking too... roughly. But what I was supposed to do when he looked like he wouldn't understand otherwise?! Speaking gracefully is tiring too…

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\n(Hard to read as this part has been damaged.)

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\n(Hard to read as this part has been damaged.)

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\nThat jerk-of-man, king of Ariant was robbed. I hear he REALLY got robbed... Just out of courtesy, I told him that he has my condolences, but... BOY does he deserve it! Phantom the master thief, huh? I kind of like him already.

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\n(Hard to read as this part has been damaged.)

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\nBarren land... there's nothing I can do within my power. What could I do to help El Nath become more rich? I will have to talk more with the king.

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\n(Hard to read as this part has been damaged.)

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\nI hear stories about Phantom the master thief wherever I go. Is he a righteous thief that only steals from the rich? He sure does sound cool... I would actually like to meet him, but... all Ereve has are trres and grass... I guess he won't be coming anytime soon.

string.name: text
string.value: (Looks faded, as if she wrote it and erased it after.)\n\nIt's not that I don't like my duties as the empress, but... sometimes I want to be a normal girl. I shouldn't have these thoughts, should I...?

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\n(Hard to read as this part has been damaged.)

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\n(Hard to read as this part has been damaged.)

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\nIf he won't come, then can't I just call him? I'm talking about Phantom the master thief, of course. Rumors say that he only targets extremely valuable things, so... how about I create a rumor that an extremely valuable treasure is at Ereve? Worth a shot, right? But... he IS Phantom the master thief... what if I don't even get to see his face?

string.name: text
string.value: Month: X, Day: X\n\n(Hard to read as this part has been damaged.)

string.name: text
string.value: #eM-Forcer Action Guide#n

string.name: text
string.value:
Table of Contents
#L1##b1. What Are M-Forcers?#k#l
#L2##b2. Eligibility#k#l 
#L3##b3. Trust of the People Score#k#l 
#L4##b4. Bonus Score#k#l 
#L5##b5. Interview Score#k#l 
#L6##b6. Getting In#k#l

string.name: text
string.value: #e#b1. What Are M-Forcers?#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: They're brave warriors from the Omega Sector who protect Maple World from the alien threat! They must be fit, both mentally and physically. Join them, if you think you're up to the task!

string.name: text
string.value: #e#b2. Eligibility#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: You need bravery, will, and trust to become an M-Forcer. You can get ordinary bravery, will, and trust just by eliminating normal monsters.

string.name: text
string.value: You can start the Action Exam as soon as you meet the minimum requirements, but your Bonus Score will be a little too low for you to realistically pass the exam. You can learn more about improving your score in the Bonus Score section.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#b2. Trust of the People Score#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: This score depends on your class, level, and fame, but the biggest part of what determines this score is the impression you make on other people!

string.name: text
string.value: To make a good impression, you'll need a Sincere Expression, a Genuine Smile, a solid Fashion Sense, and Intellectual Poise. Talk to Dr. Pepper about how to obtain these traits.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#b2. Bonus Score#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: The amount of bravery, will, and faith you have makes a huge difference in whether you pass the Action Exam!

string.name: text
string.value: We've listed the methods you can earn more bravery, will, and faith in the next section.

string.name: text
string.value: \n#b4-1. How to Obtain Bravery#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: 1) Bravery#k \n - Hunt normal monsters

string.name: text
string.value: 2) Sincere Bravery#k \n - Hunt normal monsters (rare) \n - Participate in Gonzo Gallery

string.name: text
string.value: 3) Bountiful Bravery \n - Defeat bosses

string.name: text
string.value: \n#b4-1. How to Obtain Will#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: 1) Will#k \n - Hunt normal monsters \n - Purchase from General Stores

string.name: text
string.value:
2) Willful Will
 - Hunt normal monsters (rare) 
 - Participate in Monster Park 
 - Participate in Mu Lung Dojo 
 - Hunt master monsters

string.name: text
string.value: 3) Unwavering Will \n - Hunt in the Forest of Endurance and Forest of Tenacity

string.name: text
string.value: \n#b4-1. How to Obtain Trust#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: 1) Trust#k \n - Hunt normal monsters

string.name: text
string.value: 2) Trusting Trust#k \n - Participate in party quests

string.name: text
string.value: 3) Unconditional Trust#k \n - Participate in party quests (rare)

string.name: text
string.value: Complete the [Advice from General Maestro] quests to get more bravery, will, and trust.

string.name: text
string.value: \n#b4-4. The Right Attitude#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: This score is determined by a chat you have with Dr. Kim. Just answer his questions honestly. The questions change annually, but they're all related to the attitude that a good M-Forcer should have.

string.name: text
string.value: But you also have to strategize. If collecting bravery, will, and trust takes too long, you might want to focus on your Trust of the People and Interview Scores instead.

string.name: text
string.value: The choice is yours.

string.name: text
string.value: #e#b2. Interview Score#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: You can join M-Force and obtain exclusive M-Forcer items if your combined Trust of the People Score, Bonus Score, and Interview Score exceed 1000! Even if you don't get in, you can still get some souvenirs!

string.name: text
string.value: #e#b6. Getting In#k#n

string.name: text
string.value: You can join M-Force and obtain exclusive M-Forcer items if your combined Trust of the People Score, Bonus Score, and Interview Score exceed 1000! Even if you don't get in, you can still get some souvenirs!

string.name: text
string.value: You have it in you to become a Mesorange! Keep trying until you succeed!

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서##eKorean Folktale#n

string.name: text
string.value: \N#fn궁서#7 Gemstones

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#A few years ago, there was a big fire in the Korean Folk Town. While everyone was busy putting out the fire, an important box that Chumji was safekeeping disappeared.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#With the disappearance of the box that maintained the innocent of the Korean Folk Town, Chumji had no choice but to close the entrance to the town.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Ever since then, no one had been able to enter the Korean Folk Town.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#But just a few years later, the Korean Folk Town townspeople suddenly started to change.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The kind Hongbu couldn’t hold his anger, and Kong Ji was becoming lazy, all the while the Devoted Brothers started envying each other.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Korean Folk Town started to become twisted as the people gradually began to change from their original stories.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#All of Ludibrium could fall in danger if they keep diverging from their stories.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#As the situation grew uneasy, Wiz, the Helios Tower Librarian, asked the Hero for help.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Hero, who ran all the way here after receiving Wiz’s letter, made his way down to the Korean Folk Town right away to resolve the crisis. But he just could not figure out why his luggage felt so heavy.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Upon arriving in Korean Folk Town, the Hero discovers the librarian’s assistant Moni who had tagged along secretly in his luggage. Just as she was hesitantly about to speak, they heard a moaning coming from somewhere.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#They followed the moaning sounds to find where Chumji had collapsed. Thanks to Moni’s knowledge and the Hero’s courage, they were able to create an herbal medicine to wake Chumji up.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Upon regaining consciousness and seeing Moni show up to town without any warning, Chumji chastised her. But being that it was more urgent to stop the enraged Hongbu, he asked Moni to soothe the man, handing her the kaleidoscope.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The two find Hongbu at Nolbu’s House, but unfortunately lose him as he chases Nolbu into the mountains.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#While Moni was tending to the fallen Nolbu’s wife, the Hero chased after Hongbu into the mountains first. Although the Hero tries to stop Hongbu in front of the Goblin House, he falls to Hongbu, who awakened from the gemstone’s power.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#As the Angry Hongbu tried to thwart Nolbu, Moni caught up just in time and rushed to block Nolbu.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#But something strange happened at that moment. Who would’ve expected that the gemstone’s energy flowing from Hongbu’s body would but sucked into Moni?

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Taking advantage of the weakened gemstone’s power in Hongbu, the Hero succeeded in defeating him. But Nolbu, who still hadn’t come to his senses in the midst of this turmoil, went on snubbing Hongbu.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Moni, who was listening to the story, couldn’t suppress her anger at that moment and snatched Hongbu’s spatula, using it to knock Nolbu out with a single blow.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Seeing Nolbu collapse wetting his pants, Hongbu became reminded of his childhood. He was reminded of how Nolbu would carry the then bed-wetting Hongbu on his back, all the way back home.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Hongbu’s anger faded away and this time, he carried Nolbu back to the town on his back. The Hero and Moni then returned to Chumji with the #bStone of Rage#k that was sitting in the spot Hongbu had just left.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Chumji explained what was going on as he put away the Stone of Rage in the safe. He also expressed surprise at the fact that Moni absorbed the gemstone’s energy.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#After asking them to find* the remaining 6 gemstones, he whispered something to the Hero. Quietly enough so Moni wouldn’t hear anything.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Hero and Moni then started collecting 5 gemstones with great momentum.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The #bStone of Regrets#k was veiled upon Mr. Shim. He was full of regret, blaming himself for Shim Chung’s disappearance.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Hero and Moni went after the Qing Merchant and Qing Oarsman to help the old man, but were not able to find Shim Chung. The truth is, she turned out to have been in the outhouse all day because of a meat sidedish she had the day before.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Mr. Shim ends up finding his daughter Shim Chung at home and becomes relieved of the #bStone of Regrets#k. The Hero and Moni return the gemstone to Chumji.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The #bStone of Gluttony#k was veiled over the tiger who liked Haenim’s Mother’s rice cakes.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Hero and Moni make a bunch of rice cakes to satisfy the gluttony of the tiger, but they end up falling to their knees in front his bottomless gluttony.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#What brought an end to the tiger’s gluttony was none other than the filthy hands of Haenim' s Mother. As the #bStone of Gluttony#k fell off the tiger who ran away throwing up, the Hero and Moni took it back to Chumji.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The #bStone of Envy#k was attached to both brothers of the Devoted Brothers. The two were being envious over one woman.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#In order to the end the frustrating love triangle, Moni had both of them propose to the girl and waited for the outcome, but neither of them were able to succeed in their proposal.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The #bStone of Envy#k fell off the two brothers, who unwinded their broken heart with their brotherly

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#One day, while in the process of collecting the gemstones, Moni was told about her past by Chumji.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#All this time, Moni had thought that she was an abandoned baby who was adopted to the library, but she was in fact, discovered in the Korean Folk Town. A few years ago, sometime after there was that big fire.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#love, and the Hero and Moni then took the Stone to Chumji.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Even Wiz, who knew every character in the story, could not figure out who she was. So he and Chumji then brought Moni to the Helios Tower Library, where she then grew up.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Moni, who was just told about her past, was quite composed. That was because she had thus far lived assuming that there must’ve been some kind of reason, since she didn’t have any memories before that.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Will the truth about Moni’s past be revealed too, when the Korean Folk Town danger is resolved? Moni, Chumji, and the Hero can only hope so.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Hero and Moni swiftly began to recover the remaining 3 gemstones.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The #bStone of Greed#k was bound to the Lumberjack who bothered the God of Mountains every single day. The Lumberjack would go to the god everyday and bring back treasures from him.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#In order to fix that terrible habit, Hero and Nomi decided to use a legend about a ghost.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#As they succeeded in fixing the Lumberjack’s horrible habit after disguising themselves as ghosts with the help of the God of Mountains, the #bStone of Greed#k fell off him.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The #bStone of Sloth#k was bound to Kong Ji, who had become very lazy. The Hero and Moni decided to use Magistrate in order to change her.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#On the day that the Magistrate was leaving, Kong Ji had come to propose to him but ended up bringing together the Magistrate with the girl he likes, rendering herself to watch the two from afar.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The #bStone of Sloth#k fell off Kong Ji as she overcame her broken heart and further matured. The Hero and Nomi then took the gemstone to Chumji.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Now, when only the #bStone of Jealousy#k remains, there is suddenly a big fire in the Back Mountain of the Korean Folk Town. Just like that one instance a few years back.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#While the people were quickly putting out the fire as they did once before, the Hero and Moni went into a hidden cave while searching for the place where the fire began.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The two came to the realization that this was someone’s hideout after spotting the gemstone looking-like things on the cave floor. And at that moment, they saw someone fleeing out the cave and chased after the fugitive.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The end of the cave led to a cliff, where a mask-less Goblin was standing. He was infuriated that he failed the avenge Nine-Tailed Fox.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Just in time, the Korean Folk Town townspeople had also come up towards the cliff after putting out the Back Mountain fire. They were startled to see the Goblin.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Goblin became even more enraged upon seeing Chumji. He pointed the blame for Nine-Tailed Fox’s death to Chumji. He ended up embedding the #bStone of Envy#k onto his own body in name of revenge.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Hero tried to stop the Goblin, but he could not stop him once the Goblin had further awakened. At that moment, however, Moni came to remember everything about her past.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Moni was, in fact, the Nine-Tailed Fox. When there was that big fire a few years ago, the Nine-Tailed Fox that everyone thought had died had become human, and was then found by Wiz.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Moni now realized why she was in this place. In order to pay for her crime of stealing the gemstones, Moni had come back as human to fix the town that became wry due to the gemstones.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Moni, who had recovered all of her memories, approached the awakened Goblin. The energy of the gemstone seeped into Moni as she got closer, tormenting her, but she withstood it.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Goblin was able to tell that Moni was Nine-Tailed Fox from her words and actions, and tried to keep her away from the gemstone. But as the gemstone poured out, he was unable to control even that.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Goblin, who saw how much agony Moni was suffering, jumped off the cliff himself in order to stop the outpouring of the gemstone.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Hero, who went to the bottom of the cliff after Moni, found her crying while holding onto the Goblin. The Goblin closed his eyes in her arms just like that. Forever.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Moni didn’t come outside for a very long time after the Goblin died. After some time had passed like that, Moni was able to step outside once again with the strength gathered from the townspeople’s consolations.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Chumji handed Moni the box containing all the collected gemstones. That thing was not needed in the Korean Folk Town any longer. Since everyone overcame the difficult hardships, and also because there was the new safety measure arranged by Spiegelmann.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The Hero and Moni, who returned to the Helios Tower Library, explained the whole story to Wiz.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Wiz had already been hearing about the news from his mentor Chumji. He expressed countless gratitude to the Hero.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#And just like that, the crisis of the Korean Folk Town was resolved by the efforts of the Hero and Moni.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#The returned lassie decided to record everything that she and the Hero went through in a book.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#She was hoping that all the adventures and development stories of Moni and the Hero would be of help to the townspeople.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Furthermore, she was hoping that reading the book would make him, the Hero who rescued the Korean Folk Town with his relentless commitment, courage, and kind heart, happy.

string.name: text
string.value:
And, like this... 
Just as I wished,
you are reading this book.

string.name: text
string.value: The Hero who saved the Korean Folk Town,\rtransformed the people,\rand guided me on.

string.name: text
string.value: Thank you. Sincerely.

string.name: text
string.value: \n- From Moni.

string.name: text
string.value: February 3

string.name: text
string.value: Writing a diary has been all the rage among humans lately, so I have decided to do the same.

string.name: text
string.value: But as a goddess, I thought a research log of my work would be more prudent.

string.name: text
string.value: February 7

string.name: text
string.value: I've begun developing a potion that causes the drinker to grow many times their normal size.

string.name: text
string.value: Any discoveries I might make can benefit others.

string.name: text
string.value: April 3

string.name: text
string.value: I believe I've finally found the right formula for the potion! The first batch is ready, so I plan to test its effectiveness soon.

string.name: text
string.value: April 5

string.name: text
string.value: Testing went... poorly, and this failure is disheartening. It's difficult to stay motivated.

string.name: text
string.value: April 22

string.name: text
string.value: I've decided to take a new approach with my research. I'm determined to find something that will help others!

string.name: text
string.value: May 26

string.name: text
string.value: My pride made me reckless. While I will take responsibility for my mistake, I fear it was too great for me to earn forgiveness. I may need help.

string.name: text
string.value: In addition, JM of Kerning City seems to harbor hatred for me. He is clearly opposed to my experiments.

string.name: text
string.value: June 6

string.name: text
string.value: Research is progressing smoothly, but I'm taking extra precautions to ensure there are no more mistakes.

string.name: text
string.value: I've tested the new formula with the first live plants, and the results are promising!

string.name: text
string.value: June 8

string.name: text
string.value: I was distracted today and mistakenly rinsed the potion remnants down the drain. My earlier caution was insufficient.

string.name: text
string.value: So little of the potion was actually left that I doubt anything will come of it, but there is still a nagging fear in the back of my mind.

string.name: text
string.value: June 15

string.name: text
string.value: Perhaps there was no reason for me to worry.

string.name: text
string.value: There's been no news of anything amiss as a result of my mistake.

string.name: text
string.value: June 20

string.name: text
string.value: It seems my greatest fear has come to fruition. King Slime has made his appearance, and we must gather Explorers to defeat Dyle.

string.name: text
string.value: These are merely temporary obstacles in the way of progress. I can help so many if I'm successful.

string.name: text
string.value: Simple-minded humans...

string.name: text
string.value: (The next lines are smudged and illegible.)

string.name: text
string.value: The only things they care about are money and their own selfish desires.

string.name: text
string.value: But the White Mage seems different.

string.name: text
string.value: I've never met such a kind and idealistic human.

string.name: text
string.value: (The next lines are smudged and illegible.)

string.name: text
string.value: He has such captivating ideas. If they were made reality...

string.name: text
string.value: Our beautiful forest has been overrun with fiends who have the gall to steal our treasures!

string.name: text
string.value: If they are allowed to continue, they'll destroy everything we hold dear!

string.name: text
string.value: (The next lines are smudged and illegible.)

string.name: text
string.value: Humans are worse than even our most fearsome monsters.

string.name: text
string.value: When destroying our home wasn't enough, they began kidnapping our people.

string.name: text
string.value: Will they never stop?

string.name: text
string.value: The White Mage was right. We must rely on the power of light to warm our weary spirits.

string.name: text
string.value: When his research is complete, our world will flourish. We can only benefit.

string.name: text
string.value: However I fear there isn't enough time. The humans destroy more each day.

string.name: text
string.value: Maybe it's ready as is...

string.name: text
string.value: (The next lines are smudged and illegible.)

string.name: text
string.value: I eagerly await the day that the White Mage's plans are set in motion.

string.name: text
string.value: On that day, we will...

string.name: text
string.value: (The next lines are smudged and illegible.)

string.name: text
string.value: It finally started!

string.name: text
string.value: And what a wonderful day it is!

string.name: text
string.value: (The next lines are smudged and illegible.)

string.name: text
string.value: The White Mage spoke the truth when he said ultimate light can be found within ultimate darkness.

string.name: text
string.value: Together, we will destroy the world and begin anew.

string.name: text
string.value: I am ready.

string.name: text
string.value: I will remove all life on Victoria Island and prepare it for his glorious plan.

string.name: text
string.value: (The next lines are smudged and illegible.)

string.name: text
string.value: Rumor has it his first exposure to magic was a travelling magician. While they may have been simple magician's tricks, he was still captivated by what he saw. The beauty and elegance of creating something from nothing drove him to learn everything he could about this mysterious power.

string.name: text
string.value: He traveled to Ellinia to study magic, but no one would take him as an apprentice. Ellinia forest was not always the easily traveled place it is today, and his rural country backgroud did not inspire confidence in those he hoped would teach him.

string.name: text
string.value: But he never lost hope, and his passion to learn made him work even harder to succeed. He made himself a home in Ellinia and began studying everything he could find on the subject of magic. He may have been ordinary when he began, but he soon earned an extraordinary reputation among the people of Ellinia.

string.name: text
string.value: During that time, he earned the faith and trust of Grendel the Really Old, elder of Ellinia. Grendel had particular interest in magic that could not only revive the forest but that could also expand the forest beyond its borders into other regions. It was his greatest desire to see that wondrous place flourish, and he entrusted the young magician with the task.

string.name: text
string.value: While the idea of plants and flowers flourishing in a desert was unconventional to say the least, the young magician took up the challenge with enthusiasm. His intense research and resulting discoveries were highly praised, and he eventually became known as the Genius of Ellinia.

string.name: text
string.value: This savant of magic progressed in his training faster than any other and, to this day, remains one of the most prestigious magicians of all time. Through it all, he maintained his humility and continued feeding his insatiable appetite for knowledge.

string.name: text
string.value: But that hunger for magic soon became his greatest weakness. He began seeking ever more powerful magic to satisfy him, eventually turning to the dark magic contained within the forbidden ancient texts. Though he had become powerful enough to wield that dark magic, he did not truly understand its nature.

string.name: text
string.value: The more he used that magic, the greater the hold it gained on his mind, slowly warping and blinding him to the evil he would one day unleash upon the world. His old, kind nature began to fade, giving way to the darkness.

string.name: text
string.value: The wonderful magic that had first sparked his desire to learn was no longer a part of him. In the end, he became a mere slave to the darkness, but he had realized his mistake far too late.

string.name: text
string.value: How could one so enlightened become so damaged by darkness?

string.name: text
string.value: When he finally sought the judgment of the elders, he was but a shadow of his former self. Gritto wanted to destroy him, but Grendel could not bear to harm his former protege. Instead, the once-great magician was stripped of his power and spent the rest of his life under the watchful eyes of the elders.

string.name: text
string.value: His life may have ended in darkess and his name lost to time, but the legacy of his good deeds will live on forever.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서##eThe Shadowdealer Code#n

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#Savage Terminal Branch: Gen

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#I. Rules

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 1. Always remain proud of your station.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 2. Infighting between Shadowdealers is prohibited.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 3. Do not fight unless there is profit in it.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 4. Never do anything for free if you can charge a fee.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 5. Betrayal is worse than lost profits.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 6. Transactions should always be swift and accurate.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서#II. Maxims

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 1. Give a peck and get a bushel.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 2. The simple life is the best life.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 3. If you cannot enjoy it, avoid it.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 4. You always reap what you sow.

string.name: text
string.value: #fn궁서# 5. The early worm dies first.

string.name: text
string.value: #eKritias - Anthology of Retrospection#n

string.name: text
string.value: \n Table of Contents\n#L2# 1. Angel of Death#l

string.name: text
string.value: #eHekatonian Calendar Year 52#n

string.name: text
string.value: #eAngel of Death#n\nAny story worth telling has an unexpected start.

string.name: text
string.value: We lost many lives the day the Anti-Magic Stone fell, and its destruction gave us our first glimpse of her new form.

string.name: text
string.value: She took on a spectral appearance as her body reformed before our very eyes. A sinister light surrounded her in a halo of darkness!

string.name: text
string.value: Terror overtook us, and many proclaimed this sight was an#r omen of disaster#k.

string.name: text
string.value: Years later, our worst fears became reality.

string.name: text
string.value: #eKritias - Anthology of Retrospection#n

string.name: text
string.value:
Table of Contents
#L2# 1. Angel of Death#l
#L4# 2. Orphan's Empathy#l

string.name: text
string.value: #eHekatonian Calendar Year 52#n

string.name: text
string.value: #eAngel of Death#n\nAny story worth telling has an unexpected start.

string.name: text
string.value: We lost many lives the day the Anti-Magic Stone fell, and its destruction gave us our first glimpse of her new form.

string.name: text
string.value: She took on a spectral appearance as her body reformed before our very eyes. A sinister light surrounded her in a halo of darkness!

string.name: text
string.value: Terror overtook us, and many proclaimed this sight was an#r omen of disaster#k.

string.name: text
string.value: Years later, our worst fears became reality.

string.name: text
string.value: #eHekatonian Calendar Year 54#n

string.name: text
string.value: #eOrphan's Empathy#n\nI've not heard the name #rJean#k in quite some time. The last words that boy ever spoke to me still echo within my mind.

string.name: text
string.value: \n"If I had died in that accident... would anyone have missed me?"

string.name: text
string.value: As an orphan with no home or family, it seems his greatest fear was of being forgotten.

string.name: text
string.value: Perhaps his own circumstances sparked compassion for the girl within him.

string.name: text
string.value: But I could never be sure, and time has clouded my memory of him.

string.name: text
string.value: #eKritias - Anthology of Retrospection#n

string.name: text
string.value: #eHekatonian Calendar Year 52#n

string.name: text
string.value: #eAngel of Death#n\nAny story worth telling has an unexpected start.

string.name: text
string.value: We lost many lives the day the Anti-Magic Stone fell, and its destruction gave us our first glimpse of her new form.

string.name: text

string.name: text
string.value: Years later, our worst fears became reality.

string.name: text
string.value: #eHekatonian Calendar Year 54#n

string.name: text
string.value: #eOrphan's Empathy#n\nI've not heard the name #rJean#k in quite some time. The last words that boy ever spoke to me still echo within my mind.

string.name: text
string.value: \n"If I had died in that accident... would anyone have missed me?"

string.name: text
string.value: As an orphan with no home or family, it seems his greatest fear was of being forgotten.

string.name: text
string.value: Perhaps his own circumstances sparked compassion for the girl within him.

string.name: text
string.value: But I could never be sure, and time has clouded my memory of him.

string.name: text
string.value: #eHekatonian Calendar Year 54#n

string.name: text
string.value: #eHekaton the Benevolent#n

string.name: text
string.value: That is how the people of Kritias saw their king. His strength, wisdom, and compassion surpassed even his extraordinary knowledge of magic. Under his brilliant leadership, Kritias entered into its grand renaissance.

string.name: text
string.value: But as the city flourished, the king became weak and frail with age. His once great mind became warped by fear, and his benevolence turned to cruelty.

string.name: text
